title: Minister Diab to hold a press conference in Moncton, New Brunswick
summary: The Honourable Lena Metlege Diab, Minister of Immigration, Refugees and Citizenship, will make an announcement regarding immigration in Francophone minority communities outside Quebec. Minister Diab will be joined by the Honourable Ginette Petitpas Taylor, Member of Parliament for Monctonâ€”Dieppe.
